title: Ortho Core™ | Comprehensive Multivitamin | AOR
description: AOR’s Ortho Core™ is an advanced, complete multivitamin supplement, formulated with more than 45 different vitamins, minerals & phytonutrients.
text:
Ortho Core™
A comprehensive everyday multivitamin*
- Advanced multivitamin and multimineral formula
- Provides biologically crucial antioxidants and phytonutrients
- Delivers the most effective forms and doses of vitamins and minerals
Product Information
Ortho Core™ provides all of the recognized vitamins and minerals in their most effective forms and doses available. This powerful multivitamin acts as an antioxidant, helping your body fight excess free radicals. It also promotes increased energy levels and supports general health.
Eating healthy and having a balanced diet is what we need to provide the vitamins and minerals our body demands. However, our diets are often not supplying the recommended doses our body needs to work properly and make us feel good and healthy.
Since vitamins and minerals are essential nutrients our body needs to support human life and health, and some only last a few hours in our system, our scientists created supplements to help our body close the gap between what we need and what we get. Some of the multivitamin supplements on the market today do not even meet the requirement for dietary nutrient intake.
AOR Advantage
AOR’s Ortho Core™ is an advanced, complete and superior multivitamin supplement, formulated with more than 45 different nutrients including the most effective forms and doses available of vitamins, minerals and phytonutrients.
Ortho Core™ is a comprehensive, balanced multi-vitamin/mineral supplement. It contains a broad spectrum of vitamins, minerals, antioxidants and other factors, including phytonutrients, for the maintenance of good health and to help the body metabolize carbohydrates, fats and proteins.*
AOR™ guarantees that all ingredients have been declared on the label.
Take one to six capsules daily with meals, or as directed by a qualified health care practitioner. Take a few hours before or after taking other medications. Do not crush, mix, or blend capsules. Swallow capsules whole.
Consult a health care practitioner prior to use if you are pregnant, breastfeeding, taking blood thinners, blood pressure medication, antibiotics, nitroglycerin, have diabetes, cystinuria, liver disorder, or if you have an iron deficiency. Discontinue use and consult a health care practitioner if you experience sweating, paleness, chills, headache, dizziness or confusion (as these may be symptoms of serious low blood sugar); if you develop symptoms of liver trouble such as yellowing of the skin/eyes (jaundice), stomach pain, dark urine, sweating, nausea, unusual tiredness or loss of appetite. Rare, unpredictable cases of liver injury associated with green tea extract-containing products have been reported (in Canada and internationally). Consult a health care practitioner if you develop symptoms of liver trouble or for use beyond 12 weeks. Keep out of reach of children.
*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
† Daily Value not established. ‡Contains 15 mg sodium per serving. Sources: tocopherols (soy), tocotrienols (palm).
Other Ingredients: chlorophyllin copper complex, tocopherols (soy), olive & palm oils, esters of fatty acids, starch (pea, rice, soy, corn, modified food, tapioca), cellulose gum, acacia gum, sodium alginate, ascorbyl palmitate, sucrose, silicon dioxide, dicalcium phosphate, tricalcium phosphate, dextrin (corn & tapioca), maltodextrin (corn), hydroxypropyl cellulose, microcrystalline cellulose, talcum (soy), magnesium trisilicate, glycine, aspartic acid, citric acid, propylene glycol, lecithin (sunflower), sodium ascorbate, medium chain triglycerides, sodium carboxymethylcellulose and rosemary extract. Capsule: hypromellose. Contains: Soy and corn.
